quote: ...I've returned and I look around me and think, I've missed my life. While I was off and alone, it went on here, without me, and I'm forever doomed to be a stranger in my own home.
quote_letters: IVE RETURNED AND I LOOK AROUND ME AND THINK IVE MISSED MY LIFE WHILE I WAS OFF AND ALONE IT WENT ON HERE WITHOUT ME AND IM FOREVER DOOMED TO BE A STRANGER IN MY OWN HOME
